directions: In a saucepan bring broth to a boil. Add rice and stir. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 30 to 40 minutes, until very well cooked.  Remove from heat and let stand, covered, 5 minutes.
In a food processor or blender, combine mushroom soup, broccoli and cooked rice.  Puree until smooth.  Store, tightly covered, in refrigerator.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
title: Rice Puree
